name: Flavio dos Santos
description: Flavio dos Santos was a member of6th Streetand a supporter of the previous boss. He considered himself almost invincible based on how lucky he was. WhenWill Gunnerand his supporters killed the old guard, Flavio went into hiding. Gunner was still looking for Flavio and as a result, the latter hiredEl Capitánto smuggle him out ofNight City. Flavio celebrated this by hiring numerous joygirls. which eventually attracted the 6er attention. El Capitán hiredVto retrieve Flavio. The party was a massacre which left a majority of thejoytoysdead and an injured Flavio left hiding in his bedroom. V...
